description.english: Expect action, drama, suspense and yodelling.
description.german: Dich erwarten Action, Drama, Spannung und Gejodel.
description.french: Attendez-vous à de l'action, des drames, du suspense et des chants tyroliens.
description.italian: Aspettatevi azione, dramma, suspense e canzoni yodel.
description.koreana: 액션, 드라마, 서스펜스 및 요들송을 만끽해 보세요.
description.spanish: Encontrarás acción, drama, suspense y yodel tirolés.
description.schinese: 曲折的情节、戏剧性的场面、步步加深的悬念，甚至还有岳得尔调都汇聚于此。
description.tchinese: 曲折的情節、戲劇性的場面、步步加深的懸念，甚至還有約德爾牧牛歌都匯聚於此。
description.russian: Вас ждут к экшн, драма, саспенс и йодли.
description.japanese: アクション、ドラマ、サスペンス、そしてヨーデルが満載。
description.dutch: Zet je schrap voor actie, suspense en jodelen.
description.turkish: Aksiyon, dram, merak ve tirol tarzı şarkılar bekleyin.
description.brazilian: Prepare-se para muita ação, drama, suspense e canto tirolês.

displayName.dutch: Een nacht om nooit te vergeten
displayName.brazilian: Uma noite para ficar na memória

displayName.tchinese: 那個男人瘋了，手裡還有槍

description.english: Annie can tell when she's being tailed.

description.koreana: 애니는 미행 당하는 걸 알 수 있습니다.

description.english: Annie returns the briefcase to her handler without losing any of the money.
description.german: Annie übergibt den Aktenkoffer an ihren Vorgesetzten, ohne dass dabei Geld verloren geht.
description.french: Annie rend la mallette à son supérieur sans perdre d'argent.
description.italian: Annie restituisce la valigetta al suo capo senza perdere soldi.
description.koreana: 애니는 돈을 한 푼도 잃지 않고 서류 가방을 정보관에게 돌려 줍니다.

description.russian: Энни возвращает портфель своему куратору, не теряя при этом ни цента.
description.japanese: アニーはお金を失うことなくブリーフケースを上司に返す。

description.turkish: Annie hiç para kaybetmeden evrak çantasını kontağına geri götürür.
description.arabic: آني ترجع الحقيبة إلى المدبر بدون فقد أي أموال.
description.brazilian: Annie devolve a maleta ao seu contato sem perder nenhum dinheiro.

displayName.japanese: とらえどころのない影

description.french: Annie ne se fait jamais attraper par la police.
description.italian: Annie non viene mai catturata dalla polizia.
description.spanish: La policía no detiene a Annie.La policía no detiene a Annie.
description.schinese: 安妮从不会落入警察手里。
description.tchinese: 安妮從不會落入警察手裡。
description.russian: Энни никогда не попадается в руки полиции.
description.japanese: アニーは決して警察に捕まらない
description.dutch: De politie krijgt Annie geen enkele keer te pakken.
description.brazilian: Annie nunca é capturada pela polícia.

description.english: Annie becomes a woman of the world.
description.german: Annie wird eine Frau von Welt.
description.french: Annie devient une femme du monde.
description.italian: Annie diventa una donna del mondo.
description.spanish: Annie se convierte en mujer del mundo.
description.schinese: 安妮是见过大世面的人。
description.tchinese: 安妮是見過世面的女人。
description.japanese: アニーは世界を制した女性になる。
description.dutch: Annie wordt een vrouw van de wereld.
description.turkish: Annie bu dünyanın kadını ünvanını alır.
description.brazilian: Annie torna-se uma mulher do mundo.

description.english: Annie makes a good showing at the Grand Prix.
description.german: Annie macht eine gute Figur beim Grand Prix.
description.french: Annie fait une belle apparition au Grand Prix.
description.italian: Annie fa una bella impressione al Gran Premio.
description.spanish: Annie hace una buena aparición en el Gran Premio.
description.schinese: 安妮在大奖赛上好好秀了一把。
description.tchinese: 安妮在大獎賽大出風頭。
description.russian: Энни делает хорошее шоу на Гран-при.
description.japanese: アニーはグランプリで良い成績を挙げる
description.dutch: Annie levert een topprestatie bij de Grand Prix.
description.arabic: قدمت آني عرضًا رائعًا في الجائزة الكبرى.
description.brazilian: Annie faz uma boa exibição no Grande Prêmio.

description.english: Annie plays a classic trick on Control.
description.german: Annie spielt der Zentrale einen klassischen Streich.
description.french: Annie fait un coup classique à Contrôle.
description.italian: Annie fa un trucco classico a Controllo.
description.spanish: Annie le hace el viejo truco del cambiazo a Control.
description.schinese: 安妮跟长官玩了一套老把戏。
description.tchinese: 安妮對長官耍了一套老把戲。
description.russian: Энни проделывает классический трюк с Шефом.
description.japanese: アニーはスパイマスターに古い手を使う。
description.dutch: Annie bespeelt het Hoofdkwartier.
description.turkish: Annie Control'e klasik bir oyun oynar.
description.brazilian: Annie aplica um truque clássico em Control.

description.spanish: Annie ha pillado un resfriado.
description.japanese: アニーは風邪をひく
description.dutch: Annie is verkouden geworden.
description.brazilian: Annie pegou um resfriado.
